Questions.question: Which of the following is the correct way to implement an <a> tag with a link?
Questions.explanation: The correct way to use the <a> tag to link a website is to use href(hypertext reference).

Questions.question: True or False: You can use the inline Javascript tag, <script> in both the head and body of an HTML document.
Questions.explanation: The <script> tag can be used in both the head and the body. When used in the head the script runs before the page loads, and if the script is in the body, it runs after the HTML is loaded

Questions.question: Which tag provides the largest text?
Questions.explanation: With the h tag, the higher the number, the smaller the font size. <header> and <footer> dont dictate size, just position on a website

Questions.question: True or False: An ID can start with a number
Questions.explanation: An ID cannot start with a number according to the naming conventions. When naming variables, they should be lowercase with a hyphen/camelCase, not begin with a number, and have descriptive names

Questions.question: True or False: 'color:' changes the color of your background
Questions.explanation: 'color:' only changes the color of the text-font, 'color-background' changes the color of the background
